snippet: Two surveys report factory strength in October, despite the 16-day government shutdown.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management says its index of national factory activity rose to 56.4 in October, its best showing since April 2011.
lead_paragraph: Two surveys report factory strength in October, despite the 16-day government shutdown.

headline.main: U.S. Manufacturing Gains at Fastest Pace in Two Years
headline.print_headline: U.S. Manufacturing Gains At Fastest Pace in Two Years
